mapper.select: SELECT article_id AS articleId ,article_title AS articleTitle ,article_content As articleContent FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT article.article_id AS article_id ,article.article_title AS article_title ,article.article_content AS article_content ,article_file.article_file_id AS article_file_id ,article_file.article_file_name AS article_file_name ,article_file.article_file_ext AS article_file_ext ,article_file.article_file_type AS article_file_type ,article_file.article_file_size AS article_file_size FROM article INNER JOIN article_file ON article.article_id = article_file.article_id WHERE article.article_id = #{articleId}
